visual_eliane module

visual_eliane.bar_chart_distribution_percentage(df)

Create a bar chart showing the percentage distribution of calls by district and category.

Parameters:

df (pandas.DataFrame) – DataFrame containing the call data with district and call categories.

visual_eliane.line_chart_district_calls(df)

Create a line chart showing the call count per district, categorized by call type.

Parameters:

df (pandas.DataFrame) – DataFrame containing the call data with district and call categories.

visual_eliane.map_generator(filepath3)

Generate a geographical map showing the distribution of calls across Baltimore districts.

Parameters:

filepath3 (str) – The path to the CSV file containing the cleaned call distribution data.

visual_eliane.process_and_save_images(filepath, filepath3)

Main function to load the data and generate charts and a map.
